Heading 0.description: Big bold headings - use very sparingly. Should be the title of a document or as an accent in the background.

Body p0.description: Accent body text. Use for hero sections or sparingly to emphasize the point.

Special label.description: Use to label graphs or caption images.

Special quote.description: Can be used as an alternative to p0 specifically for quotes.
